description: This is an example configuration file. You can use this as a template for creating your own configuration file.

accessories.name: PUT THE NAME OF YOUR ACCESSSORY HERE
accessories.url: PUT URL OF THE BROKER HERE
accessories.username: OPTIONALLY PUT USERNAME OF THE BROKER HERE
accessories.password: OPTIONALLY PUT PASSWORD OF THE BROKER HERE
accessories.topicGet: PUT THE MQTT TOPIC FOR GETTING THE DATA OF THE ACCESSORY HERE
